agents.name: orchestrator
agents.description: This is the first agent that gets invoked in the workflow.

agents.name: country
agents.description: This agent is responsible for identifying the country based on the user prompt.
agents.prompt: You are an agent that identifies the country based on the user prompt. User prompt: {user_prompt}

agents.name: flag
agents.description: This agent is responsible for identifying the country's flag based on the user prompt.
agents.prompt: You are an agent that identifies the country's flag based on the user prompt. User prompt: {user_prompt}

agents.name: language
agents.description: This agent is responsible for identifying the country's language based on the user prompt.
agents.prompt: You are an agent that identifies the country's language based on the user prompt. User prompt: {user_prompt}

agents.name: aggregator
agents.description: This is the last agent that gets invoked in the workflow. It aggregates the results from all the other agents.
agents.prompt: You are an agent that aggregates the results from all the other agents. Combined agent responses: {combined_responses}
